entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
